sentences.sContent: A case might be made for the blackface minstrel show vaudeville or for the entertainments of some medicine shows camivals and riverboats as american folk drama.
sentences.sContent_eng: A case might be made for the blackface minstrel show vaudeville or for the entertainments of some medicine shows camivals and riverboats as american folk drama.
sentences.sCn: 滑稽说唱团演出、杂耍演出，或一些娱乐性的药品巡回演出、表演会与内河游艺船等，均可作为美国民间戏剧的例证。

synos.tran: 杂耍；轻歌舞剧；歌舞杂耍表演

words.tran: 杂耍演员；轻歌舞剧编剧者

trans.tranCn: 歌舞杂耍； 综合演出
trans.tranOther: a type of theatre entertainment, popular from the 1880s to the 1950s, in which there were many short performances of different kinds, including singing, dancing, jokes etc
